item.title: Lower Lobe Cargo Flow Regulating Valves

numlitem.para: Associated valve is secured closed, and
Lower lobe cargo A/C FLOW RATE for the associated cargo compartment is not selected.
Carriage of animals and perishables in associated lower cargo compartment is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard Lower Lobe Cargo Con Air Flow Rate selector "FWD or AFT INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: To secure Forward Cargo Air Conditioning Flow Regulating Valve closed:
Open the P6 panel ZONE TEMP CONT AC and ZONE TEMP CONT DC circuit breakers.
Locate Forward Cargo Flow Air Conditioning Regulating Valve located in Pack 3 bay at STA 1200, WL 101, RBL 44.
Disconnect, cap, and stow valve’s electrical connector.
Manually position the valve in the closed position (requires an Allen wrench).
Close the P6 panel ZONE TEMP CONT AC and ZONE TEMP CONT DC circuit breakers.
Position the Overhead Maintenance panel (P461) LOWER LOBE CARGO COND FLOW RATE selector to HIGH AFT or LOW AFT or OFF.
To secure Aft Cargo Flow Air Conditioning Regulating Valve closed:
Open the P6 panel ZONE TEMP CONT AC and ZONE TEMP CONT DC circuit breakers.
Locate Aft Cargo Flow Air Conditioning Regulating Valve located in main wing gear wheel well at STA 1324, WL 175, RBL 19.
Disconnect, cap, and stow valve’s electrical connector.
Manually position the valve in the closed position (require an Allen wrench).
Close the P6 panel ZONE TEMP CONT AC and ZONE TEMP CONT DC circuit breakers.
Position the Overhead Maintenance panel (P461) LOWER LOBE CARGO COND FLOW RATE selector to HIGH FWD or LOW FWD or OFF.
